00124     void anneal(CNCychp& cychp);
00125 
00126     bool isGenotypeConcordance(CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber* pProbeSetIndex, CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber* pProbeSetParent)
00127     {
00128         if ((pProbeSetParent->getGenotypeCall() == 0) && (pProbeSetIndex->getGenotypeCall() == 0)) {return true;}
00129         if ((pProbeSetParent->getGenotypeCall() == 1) && (pProbeSetIndex->getGenotypeCall() == 0)) {return true;}
00130         if ((pProbeSetParent->getGenotypeCall() == 1) && (pProbeSetIndex->getGenotypeCall() == 1)) {return true;}
00131         if ((pProbeSetParent->getGenotypeCall() == 1) && (pProbeSetIndex->getGenotypeCall() == 2)) {return true;}
00132         if ((pProbeSetParent->getGenotypeCall() == 2) && (pProbeSetIndex->getGenotypeCall() == 2)) {return true;}
00133         return false;
00134     }
00135 };
